content: to create this box you will need to have - 2 balls of size 10 cotton thread as the main color you will work with two strands held together as one strand - 1 ball of size 10 metallic or secondary color for embellishments you work with one strand of this - 1 size 4 steel crochet hook - safety pins for marking corners - 1 large eye needle to weave in ends of thread - 2 plastic-covered styrofoam blocks one cut in the appropriate 3 x 5 size to act as a mold for the box and another block that is approximately 1/8 larger to mold the lid - rust-proof pins - 1 sponge or paint brush - commercially-prepared or home-created starch for stiffening
